snippet.title: Crawlerphobia Trailer - 90s VHS Found Footage Cryptid Horror
snippet.description:
Crawlerphobia is a 90s VHS found footage horror experience that plays on realistic situations and claustrophobic environments with a deep atmosphere.



Story: A group of friends decide to enter a sewer tunnel to find and record evidence of the cryptid known as crawler creatures which people all around the world have been capturing footage off.  Soon enough you get lost and separated from your friends when you hear a distant otherworldly screech, now its up to you to make it out alive.


"A Crawler is a commonly-seen cryptid with pale skin, long-limbs, and a tall, thin body. They are generally seen around sewers and other underground areas. There are stories of this creature being seen all throughout America and other places in the world."


Release date TBD. Crawlerphobia will be free to play.

Coming out on Itch.io at https://azaxor.itch.io as part of my VHS game series featuring games such as Beldam, TRAPT, CATACOMBIA, Crawlerphobia and more.



Wish-list CATACOMBIA on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1469390/CATACOMBIA/



Original soundtrack Séance by SINIUS (Featuring Hidekazu Imashige) composed by SINIUS & Hidekazu Imashige.
Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.

https://www.sinius.co.uk/

Free Stock-Footage and Motion Graphics by FreeStockFootage4U 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYpb_SKqZrdP762HbE1epfA

Created by Aza Game Studio
https://azagamestudio.com
All rights reserved ©
